00029 class simbio_directory
00030 {
00031     private $base_dir = './';
00032     public $multi_dir_tree = false;
00033 
00040     public function __construct($str_base_dir)
00041     {
00042         if (!file_exists($str_base_dir) OR !is_dir($str_base_dir)) {
00043             $error = 'Directory '.$str_base_dir.' doesn\'t exists!';
00044             throw new Exception($error);
00045         }
00046         $this->base_dir = self::stripTrailingSlash($str_base_dir);
00047     }
00048 
00049 
00056     public function getDirectoryTree($int_max_downtree = 1, $str_current_dir = '')
00057     {
00058         if ($int_max_downtree < 1) {
00059             return;
00060         }
00061         // create directory object
00062         if ($str_current_dir) {
00063             $_dir2open = $this->base_dir.DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR.str_replace('/', DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR, $str_current_dir);
00064             $_dir = dir($_dir2open);
00065         } else {
00066             $_dir = dir($this->base_dir);
00067         }
00068 
00069         $mixed_dir_tree = array();
00070         // loop directory content and search for directory
00071         $_d = 0;
00072         while (false !== ($_entry = $_dir->read())) {
00073             $_current_entry = $_entry;
00074             if ($str_current_dir) {
00075                 $_current_entry = $str_current_dir.'/'.$_entry;
00076             }
00077             $_current_dir_path = $this->base_dir.DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR.str_replace('/', DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR, $_current_entry);
00078             if (is_dir($_current_dir_path) AND $_entry != '.' AND $_entry != '..') {
00079                 $mixed_dir_tree[$_current_entry] = $_current_entry;
00080                 // check if this directory have descendant
00081                 $_descendant = self::getDirectoryTree($int_max_downtree-1, $_current_entry);
00082                 if (is_array($_descendant)) {
00083                     // we create multidimensional array
00084                     if ($this->multi_dir_tree) {
00085                         $mixed_dir_tree[$_current_entry.'_tree'] = $_descendant;
00086                     } else {
00087                         $mixed_dir_tree = array_merge($mixed_dir_tree, $_descendant);
00088                     }
00089                 }
00090                 $_d++;
00091             }
00092         }
00093         $_dir->close();
00094         return ($_d > 0)?$mixed_dir_tree:false;
00095     }
00096 
00097 
00104     public static function stripTrailingSlash($str_dir)
00105     {
00106         return preg_replace("/(\/|\\\)$/i", '', $str_dir);
00107     }
00108 }
00109 ?>
